remarks: The set of lattice translations for a fiducial co-atom ` W ` . (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrnset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnset.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
ltrnset.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
ltrnset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrnset.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnset.d $e |- D = ( ( LDil ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnset.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnset $p |- ( ( K e. B /\ W e. H ) -> T = { f e. D | A. p e. A A. q e. A ( ( -. p .<_ W /\ -. q .<_ W ) -> ( ( p .\/ ( f ` p ) ) ./\ W ) = ( ( q .\/ ( f ` q ) ) ./\ W ) ) } ) $.
$d A p q $.
$d D f $.
$d K f p q $.
$d W f p q $.
